mods.abstract: As a Democratic candidate for the 50th congressional district, Francine Busby is the leader we need to unite us in pursuing our common goals. As Americans we should not be choosing sides against each other...we are all on the same team. As your representative, I will cast my vote and raise my voice in support of the issues that are critical to the character and quality of life we all value.

mods.abstract: Claudia Bermudez, the official nominee for the office of U.S. Representatives, is recognized as the person that can beat the incumbent, left-wing extremist Barbara Lee. Claudia is focused on jobs, the economy, and, most importantly for our district, education. With one of the largest ports in the nation, homeland security is a key issue. Claudia, a conservative and proven leader is effective and will use her ability to forge relationships in Washington D.C. to bring much needed attention to our district. As CEO of SeniorJobShop.com, Claudia Bermôdez is active in the community and has served on the Board of the Lakeside Drive Homeowners Association. She is the founder and Chair of the Republican National Hispanic Assembly of Alameda County and President of the Alameda Republican Women, Federated.
